Package edu.purdue.cs.percolator

Class StyleChecker

java.lang.Object
edu.purdue.cs.percolator.StyleChecker
public final class StyleChecker
extends Object
The StyleChecker class contains builder methods to create a code style checker to audit code style errors. StyleChecker uses the Checker from Checkstyle to audit code style.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static StyleChecker lint​(String directory, String policyFile)
    Creates a new StyleChecker with the given directory and policy.
    StyleChecker withDeduction​(double points)
    Specifies the amount to deduct from the score per code style infraction.
    StyleChecker withMaxScore​(double maxScore)
    Specifies the maximum score for the code style check.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • lint

      public static StyleChecker lint​(String directory, String policyFile)
      Creates a new StyleChecker with the given directory and policy. The directory specifies the directory that contains the files to run through the code style checker. The policy file specifies the Checkstyle configuration to enforce. The maximum score defaults to 0. The deduction amount per infraction defaults to 0.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory with Java files to audit for code style errors
      policyFile - the Checkstyle configuration file to enforce
      Returns:
      a new StyleChecker object

    • withMaxScore

      public StyleChecker withMaxScore​(double maxScore)
      Specifies the maximum score for the code style check.
      Parameters:
      maxScore - the maximum score for the code style check
      Returns:
      the StyleChecker with the new max score

    • withDeduction

      public StyleChecker withDeduction​(double points)
      Specifies the amount to deduct from the score per code style infraction. While a deduction is made for each infraction, the student score will never be below 0.
      Parameters:
      points - the number of points to deduct for each infraction
      Returns:
      the StyleChecker with the new deduction setting
